DESCRIPTION: Set the verification settings for your server.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}setcapital enable** ~ Enables the capital spam filter at 50%.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}setcapital disable** ~ Disables the capital spam filter on your server.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: **{{prefix}}setcapital [# Amount]** ~ Sets the % of capitals that are allowed in a message. Must be between 40-100.
USAGE: {{prefix}}setcapital [enable | disable | channel | role | message | internal] *[#Channel | @Role | JSON Code]*
ALIASES: Setcapital does not have any aliases
